name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF TRAVEL AGENCIES - ROMANIA
membership: ANAT has more than 500 active members - travel agencies and organizers, totaling over 80% of market turnover of travel services and travel packages, and associate members such as tourism promotion offices, airlines and transport companies, insurance companies, rent-a-car, hotels and restaurants, other associations in tourism.
goal: ANAT is the trade association of travel agencies in Romania. It represents their professional and trade interests at regional, national and european level.
interests: Budget, Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Package Travel Directive
Passenger Regulations
Data Protection
Visa Package
VAT and taxation
Passenger Name Record (PNR)
Competition issues
Insurance Mediation
Collaborative Economy/Platforms
Digital Single Market
